Title: Walking on Water (1)
Plot: When a convicted killer is cleared at appeal for the murder of his adoptive father ten years previously, Boyd is not convinced that the man is innocent. But the only way to find out is to track down the rest of the family - and with a big inheritance at stake, both parties appear to have a lot to hide..
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Contains violence and content that may disturb
GuestStars: Mark  Skillen,  Lorraine Pilkington,  Trevor Peacock,  Alan McKenna,  Lee Montague,  John McEnery,  Ranjit Krishnamma,  June Mitchell,  Anne Marie Olufuwa,  Ray Fearon,  Bonnie Hurren,  Fiona Carew,  Avril Elgar
